quotes.quote: Every time you borrow money, you're robbing your future self.
I live, eat, spend, travel, support a family, entertain.....but I do not go to work. There is something wrong. My nest egg just keeps growing.
Do not save what is left after spending, but spend what is left after saving.
Financial peace isn't the acquisition of stuff. It's learning to live on less than you make, so you can give money back and have money to invest. You can't win until you do this.
Financial peace of mind is not determined by how much we make, but is dependent upon how much we spend!
Making money is a happiness. And that's a great incentive. Making other people happy is a super-happiness.
A wise person should have money in their head, but not in their heart.
A big part of financial freedom is having your heart and mind free from worry about the what-ifs of life.
Financial literacy is just as important in life as the other basics.
The struggle for Financial Freedom is very unfair. Just look at the rewards.
Beware of little expenses. A small leak will sink a great ship.
If you want to reap financial blessings, you have to sow financially.
Financial freedom is freedom from fear.
If we command our wealth, we shall be rich and free. If our wealth commands us, we are poor indeed.
Financial Freedom is less about Financials and more about freedom.
My definition of financial freedom is simple: it is the ability to live the lifestyle you desire without having to work or rely on anyone else for money.
To achieve what 1% of the worlds population has (Financial Freedom), you must be willing to do what only 1% dare to do..hard work and perseverance of highest order.
The best thing money can buy is financial freedom
Every financial worry you want to banish and financial dream you want to achieve comes from taking tiny steps today that put you on a path toward your goals.
Financial freedom is a mental, emotional and educational process.
When you understand that your self-worth is not determined by your net-worth, then you'll have financial freedom.
It's not how much money you make, but how much money you keep, how hard it works for you, and how many generations you keep it for.

The first principle to financial freedom is to spend less than you earn, but never deprive yourself to have those good vehicles,make those lake trips provided you don't fall in debts.You don't need to be rich to be financially successful, provided you don't worry when paying the bills and you have enough left in the bank
The way to make money is to buy when blood is running in the streets.
Pursuing your passion is fulfilling and leads to financial freedom.
So many financial dreams are thwarted by the failure to act upon good intentions.
Financial freedom is available to those who learn about it and work for it.
To get rich, you have to be making money while you're asleep.
Unless you have financial resources of your own, you can't be free.
Money never made a man happy yet, nor will it. The more a man has, the more he wants. Instead of filling a vacuum, it makes one.
We tend to focus on assets and forget about debts. Financial security requires facing up to the big picture: assets minus debts.
A budget isn't about restricting what you can spend. It gives you permission to spend without guilt or regret.
The real key to making money in stocks is not to get scared out of them.
Money is like a river. It flows where the conditions are conducive to its flow.
You must gain control over your money or the lack of it will forever control you.
Financial independence is about having more choices.
The speed of your success is limited only by your dedication and what you're willing to sacrifice.
Wealth is like sea-water; the more we drink, the thirstier we become; and the same is true of fame.
Money is a terrible master but an excellent servant.
Working because you want to, not because you have to is financial freedom.
Money won't create success, freedom to make it will.
It's good to have money and the things that money can buy, but it's good, too, to check up once in a while and make sure that you haven't lost the things that money can't buy.
More important than the how we achieve financial freedom, is the why. Find your reasons why you want to be free and wealthy.
You must tell your money how you want to live your life, and not the other way round.
To obtain financial freedom, one must be either a business owner, an investor, or both, generating passive income, particularly on a monthly basis.
Financial dependence on the state is the foundation of modern serfdom.
Money is only a tool. It will take you wherever you wish, but it will not replace you as the driver.
